ch.ethz.vizzly.cache

Class CacheUpdateWorkerSynchronization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.vizzly.cache.CacheUpdateWorkerSynchronization

  • public class CacheUpdateWorkerSynchronization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class synchronizes multiple, concurrently running worker threads that are used for continuously pulling new data.
    Author:
    Matthias Keller
